name: AniHero
description:
A new match puzzle game. Easy and addictive, you can play without mobile traffic! 

Get many gifts for free in every day. Lots of cute animals bring you a happy time.
Don’t wait any more, come to play! Match animals in the cheerful music, clear annoyance and boring!

Game rule
- Click screen to match same animals, you will get score.
- Clear quickly is the key to success. Get higher score before the screen is full.

Feature
- Nice design, cool special effects and cute animals, just relax and enjoy.
- New change in each level
- Powerful props help you get higher score
- Big sale in shop, 80% OFF.
- Good luck in Lucky Wheel
- Global player ranking
- Invite friends to play
- Play without mobile traffic

Email: support@domobile.com
